Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.view.GUI

Class GUIRequestHub

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.client.RequestManager
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.view.GUI.GUIRequestHub
public class GUIRequestHub
extends RequestManager
Is a singleton that handles all the messages and information between the server and the GUI controllers.
